about.title: America's Premier Global Supplement Network

qualityFirst.title: Quality First
qualityFirst.description: Every supplier in our network meets the highest international quality standards

globalReach.title: Global Reach
globalReach.description: Connecting businesses across 52 countries with seamless cross-border solutions

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: AI-powered technology delivering smarter business solutions and faster results

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.description: Transparent operations with full compliance and ethical business practices

about.description: Founded in Orlando in 2008, we've grown from a local distributor to the world's most trusted supplement supply network, connecting premium manufacturers with businesses and governments worldwide.

story.paragraph1: What started as a vision to bridge the gap between premium supplement manufacturers and global buyers has evolved into the industry's most comprehensive supply network. Based in Orlando, Florida, we leverage America's strategic position to serve as the gateway between the Americas, Europe, and Asia-Pacific markets.
story.paragraph2: Our Orlando headquarters serves as the command center for a global operation spanning 52 countries, managing over 10,000 verified suppliers, and processing billions in annual transactions. We've earned the trust of Fortune 500 companies, government agencies, and emerging businesses alike.
story.paragraph3: Through advanced AI technology and deep industry expertise, we've revolutionized how supplement businesses discover suppliers, ensure compliance, and scale globally. Our commitment to quality, transparency, and results has made us the preferred partner for organizations seeking reliable, premium supplement solutions.

2008.title: Company Founded
2008.description: Established in Orlando as a premium supplement distributor

2012.title: Global Expansion
2012.description: Extended operations to 15 countries across Americas and Europe

2016.title: Government Contracts
2016.description: Secured first major government procurement contracts

2019.title: AI Integration
2019.description: Launched AI-powered supplier matching and compliance systems

2021.title: Fortune 500 Partnerships
2021.description: Became preferred supplier network for major corporations

2024.title: Market Leadership
2024.description: Achieved $2.8B annual transaction volume across 52 countries
